name: GI-1610
description:
EMBRACE THE ANDROID MINOTAUR!

You are GI-1610. The GALATEA Interloper Model 1610 sent on a dangerous mission to gather vital information in enemy territory... You've been beamed down to the fortress planet KERES where you must locate and collect the data core. Your people depend on it!

HOW TO PLAY

  • Collect Keys to unlock gates
  • Destroy the orange control towers
  • Vanquish the Android Minotaur
  • Gather data and energy jewels

CONTROLS

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Z to Fire
  • R to Restart
